name: GitHub Copilot Agent Environment
postCreateCommand: if ($IsWindows) { winget install --id Microsoft.VisualStudioCode.Insiders -e } elseif ($IsMacOS) { brew install --cask visual-studio-code-insiders } else { wget -qO- https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | gpg --dearmor > packages.microsoft.gpg && sudo install -o root -g root -m 644 packages.microsoft.gpg /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/ && sudo sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64,arm64,armhf signed-by=/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/packages.microsoft.gpg] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/code stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/vscode.list' && rm -f packages.microsoft.gpg && sudo apt install apt-transport-https && sudo apt update && sudo apt install code-insiders }
